pages.title: Kamen Rider Sasword
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kabuto (2006, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:kabuto/arsenal/sasword_yaiver)Sasword Yaiver$(/l) and $(l:kabuto/devices/zect_buckle#sasword_rider_belt)ZECT Buckle (Sasword)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slowness$(li)Resistance II
